name: Station Escape Omicron 1
description: You are trying to escape Space Station Omicron.  Use dual stick controls (WASD and Arrows or gamepad) to destroy enemy generators.  Destroy all generators in a room and get a key to move onto the next room.  Sometimes you can choose from several exits and its up to you to figure out the shortest path to the exit.  The exit looks like a trophy just bump into it to win!
